TextTrackCueList.summary: The TextTrackCueList interface of the WebVTT API is an array-like object that represents a dynamically updating list of objects.

remarks.para:
An instance of this type is obtained from in order to get all the cues in the object.
This interface has no constructor.

TextTrackCueListLength.summary: The length read-only property of the interface returns the number of cues in the list.
TextTrackCueListLength.value: An unsigned long which is the number of cues in the list.

TextTrackCueListGetCueById.summary: The getCueById() method of the interface returns the first in the list represented by the TextTrackCueList object whose identifier matches the value of id.
